strategy_reasoning: Using standalone images to clearly distinguish the four diverse categories of updates: Social Automation, Performance/Speed, Ecosystem Growth (New Apps), and AI Intelligence (Fixes/Models). This allows each feature to shine individually within the cohesive brand aesthetic.
story_arc: A tour of the upgraded hive: from social connection to speed, growth, and intelligence.

images.prompt: A futuristic golden bee hovering mid-air holding a glowing translucent frame resembling a social media interface, vibrant digital flowers reflecting in the glass, soft purple and gold lighting, macro photography, surreal hyperrealistic digital garden, Pollinations aesthetic
images.description: Visualizing the new Instagram automation workflow - the bee connecting the garden to the social world.

images.prompt: A sleek cybernetic bee flying at hyperspeed with motion blur trails, carrying a dense cluster of glowing golden pollen orbs organized in a perfect batch, racing through garden pathways, symbolizing database optimization and speed, surreal hyperrealistic digital garden, Pollinations aesthetic
images.description: Representing the performance improvements: batching queries and retry delays for a faster, smoother experience.

images.prompt: Two distinct, exotic digital flowers blooming rapidly side-by-side in a lush mossy garden, their petals emitting soft neon light, surrounding bees investigating the new growth, symbolizing new app submissions, surreal hyperrealistic digital garden, Pollinations aesthetic
images.description: Showcasing the ecosystem growth with new apps 'NextGenTools' and 'Aqua AI Generator' added to the platform.

images.prompt: Extreme close-up of a flower's center revealing intricate glowing geometric circuitry being repaired and aligned into perfect symmetry, golden light healing the fractures, representing bug fixes and robust JSON parsing, surreal hyperrealistic digital garden, Pollinations aesthetic
images.description: Visualizing the technical fixes and improved logic for Claude and GPT-5.2 models.

caption:
